mapper.sql: id as id , createDate as createDate , modifyDate as modifyDate , status as status , stuNo as stuNo , courseId as courseId , courseName as courseName , taskId as taskId, type as type
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_select_course_stu_detail ( createDate, modifyDate, status, stuNo, courseId, courseName, taskId, type ) VALUES ( #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{status}, #{stuNo}, #{courseId}, #{courseName}, #{taskId}, #{type} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_select_course_stu_detail
createDate = #{createDate},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate},
status = #{status},
stuNo = #{stuNo},
courseId = #{courseId},
courseName = #{courseName},
taskId = #{taskId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_select_course_stu_detail
createDate = #{map.createDate},
modifyDate = #{map.modifyDate},
status = #{map.status},
stuNo = #{map.stuNo},
courseId = #{map.courseId},
courseName = #{map.courseName},
taskId = #{map.taskId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_select_course_stu_detail ( createDate, modifyDate, status, stuNo, courseId, courseName, taskId ) VALUES ( #{map.createDate}, #{map.modifyDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.stuNo}, #{map.courseId}, #{map.courseName}, #{map.taskId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, createDate
, modifyDate
, status
, stuNo
, courseId
, courseName
, taskId
FROM saas_select_course_stu_detail
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND modifyDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.modifyDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND stuNo like CONCAT('%', #{condition.stuNo} , '%')
AND courseId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.courseId} , '%')
AND courseName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.courseName} , '%')
AND taskId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.taskId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
